stories.title: Has Fusion Had Its “Wright Brothers” Moment?
Quebec politicians’ Covid-19 vaccine passport QR codes allegedly hacked

stories.text:
What tools or processes do you use to go from an idea to a working API including an OpenAPI specification?

I've done this many times using code generation, etc. but still find the iteration time to be too long. Ideally, I'd like to get close to the speed of thought.

Bonus points if you can point to a code repository as an example.
stories.title: Ask HN: What's the fastest way to produce an API?
UN hails milestone as last country halts the sale of leaded petrol
Have you deleted your data from your device when you dispose of it?

stories.text:
Every week there is a new crisis: COVID-19, climate change, Afghanistan, and now Hurricane Ida.

Are there any startups using tech to address these current problems? I'm specifically interested in problems like housing refugees from Afghanistan, or hurricane disaster relief in Louisiana (but there are of course, many other important problems).
stories.title: Ask HN: Tech jobs addressing crises like Hurricane Ida/Afghanistan refugees?
Melatonin may decrease risk for and aid treatment of Covid-19
Comet Supercomputer Used to Illustrate Methane Storage Applications
